mapper.select: SELECT A.ITEM_CD , A.CORP_CD , A.ITEM_NM , A.ITEM_QTY , B.SALE_PRC , C.ITEM_PRC , B.DISCOUNT_RAT , A.ITEM_EXPDATE FROM TBL_BASKET AS A INNER JOIN TBL_SELLING AS B ON A.CORP_CD = B.CORP_CD AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD INNER JOIN TBL_ITEM AS C ON A.CORP_CD = C.CORP_CD AND A.ITEM_CD = C.ITEM_CD WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId} AND A.PURCHASE_ST = '주문전'
